alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:59PM CDT until June 10 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Benton, or near Yazoo City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Vaughan and Ebenezer around 525 PM CDT. Pickens around 530 PM CDT. Cameron around 540 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
